title: Ericsson, Saab and Calian partner to Strengthen Canada’s Communications Innovation
description: Collaboration will explore secure, dual-use, interoperable communication systems to enhance Canada’s defence capabilities and future readinessAgreement builds on each company’s strengths with the potential to drive innovation, joint R&D, and create high-value jobs across Canada

title: Ericsson compelled to take legal action against Transsion
description: Legal action in Brazil, India, Nigeria, and the Unified Patent Court

title: New Bengaluru Ericsson R&D unit to drive 5G software development in India
description: New unit enhances Ericsson's presence in India and reinforces its commitment to the countryInitiative is part of Ericsson's broader R&D expansion in India, including the growth of ASIC development announced in June 2025Ericsson focused on advancing 5G, 6G and AI across R&D centers in Chennai, Bengaluru, and Gurugam

title: Ericsson showcases future-ready connectivity and AI innovations at MWC Doha 2025
description: Ericsson will participate in MWC Doha 2025 between November 25-26 in Qatar to engage with industry, enterprise and government leaders in forward-looking dialogue on the next era of intelligent, secure and high-performance connectivity.Ericsson’s presence will highlight how differentiated connectivity, mission-critical networks and AI-driven automation are shaping the future of digital transformation.

title: Building the networks of the future in Hungary: Ericsson launches a 6G lab in Budapest
description: Budapest hosts one of the company’s largest R&D centers, focused on developing the networks of the futureThe center works closely with universities and research institutes in HungaryEricsson’s 6G vision aims to create a more sustainable, resilient, and human-centric digital society

title: Ericsson announces change to the Executive Team
description: Ericsson (NASDAQ: ERIC) today announces that Moti Gyamlani will step down from his role as Senior Vice President and Head of Group Function Global Operations as of January 12, 2026, and remain at Ericsson for a transition period.

title: 10 World Trade office tower in Boston deploys Ericsson's indoor 5G solution
description: Boston Global Investors, Aspen Venue Partners, and Ericsson deliver small-cell based neutral host network at 10 World Trade, a premier Class A commercial building.The Ericsson Radio Dot System provides high-capacity, multi-operator indoor coverage with scalable, sustainable performance.The solution establishes a scalable model for multi-operator connectivity that enhances enterprise operations, improves tenant experience, and supports critical safety communications in large commercial and mixed-

title: Singtel launches 5G+ Mobile Workspace, Featuring Ericsson’s Enterprise Virtual Cellular Network
description: A one-stop-shop for 5G laptop management, Ericsson’s Enterprise Virtual Cellular Network (EVCN) solution automates eSIM profile management, enabling zero-touch provisioning, transparency of network performance and secure access to corporate applications, regardless of locationEVCN underpins Singtel’s new 5G+ Mobile Workspace, which offers enterprise-grade, AI-ready laptops and digital workplace tools simplifying device management

title: Telia extends Ericsson RAN partnership in Sweden, Norway, Lithuania and Estonia
description: Four-year extension to deliver enhanced speed, capacity and coverage alongside advanced capabilitiesAgreement to help future-proof Telia’s infrastructure, while supporting innovation and efficiency across industries and sectors
